DOC.brief_summary: Prospective study where magnetic resonance imaging is compared to dual-energy computed tomography for the detection of bone marrow changes.
DOC.brief_title: Detection of Bone Marrow Changes: Comparison of MRI and DECT
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Patients with bone marrow changes Exclusion criteria: Pregnacy Age below 18 ys old Contraindications for MRI
